briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Safety of Nanoxel M Inj.
officialTitle: An Observational Study to Evaluate the Safety of Nanoxel M (Docetaxel-PM) Inj.
conditions: Breast Cancer, Non-small Cell Lung Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Ovarian Cancer, Head and Neck Cancer, Gastric Cancer, Esophageal Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Adults ≥18 years old
2. Patients who have signed written consent form prior to participating in the clinical trial
3. Patients who are assessed as adequate to administer Nanoxel M injection.

Exclusion Criteria:

1) Patients who have shown severe hypersensitivity to Docetaxel and concomitant drugs
